Submodules¶

app.application module¶

app.application.create_app(config_obj)[source]¶

Flask application factory. Inializes and returns the Flask application.

This is where blueprints are registered.

Returns: The initialized Flask application.

app.application.get_config(config_class_string)[source]¶

Load the Flask config from a class

app.blueprints module¶

All Flask blueprints are defined here

class app.config.HardCoded[source]¶

Bases: object

Constants to be used throughout the application

All hard coded settings/data that are not actual/official configuration options for Flask, Celery, or their extensions goes here.

basedir = '/Users/rodda/expert-octo-fortnight/app'¶
